name: Super Target Blaster
description:
Super Target Blaster is a demo created in the free game engine software Unity. This is a prototype testing Unity's ability to create a simple demo of the genre. 

Resources: 

  • Unity: https://unity.com/
  • FPS Assets (Environment and Guns): http://devassets.com/
  • Particle Effects: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/war-fx-5669

 Controls are standard for a first-person shooter:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Left-click to shoot
  • R to reload
  • Esc to return to menu
